amendatorysection.catchline: Division of Parole Supervision; provide access to records, reports, and documents.
amendatorysection.para: The Division of Parole Supervision shall provide the Public Counsel and the Inspector General with direct computer access to all computerized records, reports, and documents maintained in connection with administration of the Nebraska parole system, except that access for the Public Counsel and the Inspector General to a parolee’s medical or mental health records shall be subject to the parolee’s consent.
